wikipedia_page.main: Trevor Fitzpatrick (born 19 February 1980) is an English-born-Irish footballer who played as a forward for Southend United, Shelbourne and Bohemians. He represented the Republic of Ireland at the UEFA U-19 Championship in Sweden in 1999 where he won a bronze medal after scoring in the group stages.He made his debut for Southend United in a Second Division match, in the 2–1 home defeat at Luton Town on 3 January 1998, coming on as a substitute in the 67th minute for Pepe N'Diaye.
